typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Item Type} as string,
		Offline as double,
		Online as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesPivotedData
SalesPivotedData unpivot(output(
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		Revenue as double
	),
	ungroupBy({Item Type}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> UnpivotPivotedSalesData
UnpivotPivotedSalesData sink(input(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['UnPivotedSalesData.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UnPivotedSalesData
